item.title: The World Must See Gaza’s Starvation
item.description: Today, many children in Gaza are so hungry they may never recover, and our supplies are critically low.

item.title: Behind Trump’s War With Powell: A Battering Ram With 3 Million Followers
item.description: The director of the Federal Housing Finance Agency has made the removal of the Fed chair his personal mission.

item.title: How Will David Ellison Tackle the Big Problems at Paramount?
item.description: The cable business has cratered. The news division is in turmoil. A.I. is coming for movies. And those are just the obvious challenges.
